versos: (regard) 2 Corinthians 10:7 - "You are judging by appearances. If anyone is confident that they belong to Christ, they should consider again that we belong to Christ just as much as they do.";;;
(laden) Matthew 11:28 - "Come to me, all you who are weary and burdened, and I will give you rest.";;;
(fainted) Psalm 77:3 - "I remembered you, God, and I groaned; I meditated, and my spirit fainted.";;;
(revived) Psalm 80:18 - "Then we will not turn back from you; revive us, and we will call on your name.";;;
(visions) Proverbs 29:18 - "Where there is no vision, the people perish: but he that keepeth the law, happy is he.";;;
(jachin) 1 Kings 7:21 - He set up the pillars at the portico of the temple. The pillar to the south he named Jakin and the one to the north Boaz.;;;
(kohath) Numbers 4:2 - "Take a census of the Kohathite branch of the Levites by their clans and families.";;;
(insomuch) Ephesians 5:33 - Nevertheless let every one of you in particular so love his wife even as himself; and the wife see that she reverence her husband.;;
(shepherd) Psalm 23:1 - "The Lord is my shepherd, I lack nothing.";;;
(pasture) Psalm 23:2 - "He makes me lie down in green pastures; He leads me beside quiet waters.";;;
(rulers) Romans 13:3 - "For rulers are not a terror to good conduct, but to bad.";;;
(fail) Psalm 18:45 - "The nations shall come to you from the ends of the earth and shall worship before you, O Lord, and shall glorify your name.";;;
(exchange) Romans 1:25 - They exchanged the truth about God for a lie

(bodies) Romans 12:1 - "Therefore, I urge you, brothers and sisters, in view of God's mercy, to offer your bodies as a living sacrifice, holy and pleasing to God - this is your true and proper worship.";;;
(desolate) "Therefore the land will mourn, and all who dwell in it will waste away with the beasts of the field and the birds of the air; even the fish of the sea will be taken away." - Hosea 4:3;;;
(priests) Isaiah 61:6 - "But you will be called the priests of the Lord; you will be named ministers of our God.";;;
(sow) Galatians 6:7: "Do not be deceived: God cannot be mocked. A man reaps what he sows.";;;
